topProjects.title: Listening Habits
topProjects.description: A web application for viewing Spotify data such as a user's top tracks, artists and genres. Track and artist data retrieved from Spotify Web API, with top genres then being calculated from this data. The front end is built with React, with a Node.js back end for authorization.

topProjects.title: Sorting Visualizer
topProjects.description: A web application to visualize various sorting algorithms. Collection size can be adjusted as well as the speed of the sort. I built this to revise sorting algorithms further and to learn React!

otherProjects.title: jcodd.tech
otherProjects.description: You're currently looking at this project! I built this website using React to use as a CV. When building this application I decided to learn about styled-components and Next.js.
